Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Clippers beat the Dallas Mavericks 110-96 in a preseason game.
Pre-Game Insights: Clippers coach Tyronn Lue said the team is excited about having their own place to call home.
Clippers owner Steve Ballmer hopes the new arena will give his team a boost.
Post-Match Reflections: Mavericks coach Jason Kidd praised the Clippers' new arena, saying it will be like no other in terms of fan experience.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Intuit Dome is a carbon-free and cashless arena with advanced technology, including facial recognition and an 80,000-square-foot outdoor plaza.
The arena is set to host many big events, including the 2026 All-Star Game and basketball for the 2028 Olympics in Los Angeles.
